Source.Name: jhead
Source.Summary: Command line program to display and manipulate Exif headers
Source.Description: JHEAD is a simple command line tool for displaying and some manipulation of EXIF header data embedded in jpeg images from digital cameras.

Package.Name: jhead
Package.Summary: Command line program to display and manipulate Exif headers
Package.Description: JHEAD is a simple command line tool for displaying and some manipulation of EXIF header data embedded in jpeg images from digital cameras.
